Posts.Content: May 5, 2018 08:11PM Maemay wrote: I just had bilateral mastectomy on April 30, 2017. Cancer found in left breast. Er+ HER2 negative. No lymph node involvement, clear margins. However , cancer was > 5cm. I’m praying for no chemo . Who has insight?
Posts.Title: Just Diagnosed- Get Prepared sas-schatzi Amyadipose
